testcase.name: runNonInteractive > should process input and write text output
runNonInteractive > should handle a single tool call and respond
runNonInteractive > should handle error during tool execution
runNonInteractive > should exit with error if sendMessageStream throws initially
runNonInteractive > should not exit if a tool is not found, and should send error back to model
runNonInteractive > should exit when max session turns are exceeded
gemini.tsx main function > should call process.exit(1) if settings have errors
validateAuthMethod > should return null for LOGIN_WITH_GOOGLE
validateAuthMethod > should return null for CLOUD_SHELL
validateAuthMethod > USE_GEMINI > should return null if GEMINI_API_KEY is set
validateAuthMethod > USE_GEMINI > should return an error message if GEMINI_API_KEY is not set
validateAuthMethod > USE_VERTEX_AI > should return null if GOOGLE_CLOUD_PROJECT and GOOGLE_CLOUD_LOCATION are set
validateAuthMethod > USE_VERTEX_AI > should return null if GOOGLE_API_KEY is set
validateAuthMethod > USE_VERTEX_AI > should return an error message if no required environment variables are set
validateAuthMethod > should return an error message for an invalid auth method
Configuration Integration Tests > File Filtering Configuration > should load default file filtering settings
Configuration Integration Tests > File Filtering Configuration > should load custom file filtering settings from configuration
Configuration Integration Tests > File Filtering Configuration > should merge user and workspace file filtering settings
Configuration Integration Tests > Configuration Integration > should handle partial configuration objects gracefully
Configuration Integration Tests > Configuration Integration > should handle empty configuration objects gracefully
Configuration Integration Tests > Configuration Integration > should handle missing configuration sections gracefully
Configuration Integration Tests > Real-world Configuration Scenarios > should handle a security-focused configuration
Configuration Integration Tests > Real-world Configuration Scenarios > should handle a CI/CD environment configuration
Configuration Integration Tests > Checkpointing Configuration > should enable checkpointing when the setting is true
Configuration Integration Tests > Extension Context Files > should have an empty array for extension context files by default
Configuration Integration Tests > Extension Context Files > should correctly store and return extension context file paths
parseArguments > should throw an error when both --prompt and --prompt-interactive are used together
parseArguments > should throw an error when using short flags -p and -i together
parseArguments > should allow --prompt without --prompt-interactive
parseArguments > should allow --prompt-interactive without --prompt
parseArguments > should allow -i flag as alias for --prompt-interactive
loadCliConfig > should set showMemoryUsage to true when --show-memory-usage flag is present
